data.text:
About Helen Bromfield

I have been working in Music and Entertainment since the early 2000â€™s. From 2004 to 2016 I owned and operated Knockout Image LLC, an entertainment and brand marketing agency. In 2017 I joined Johnny Wright as a Management Representative for Wright Entertainment Group based in Los Angeles. I am inspired and look forward to working with She Is the Music collaborators. Congratulations and thank you!
